body_html: Hmm I actually just ran into this locally on my own cnn models. (Didn't think about that benchmark though.) I did a quick profile with cuda and found reduce_sum's being the big killers in performance (Slowdown's occur in the batch_normalize function as well as the moments calculation.)
body_text: Hmm I actually just ran into this locally on my own cnn models. (Didn't think about that benchmark though.) I did a quick profile with cuda and found reduce_sum's being the big killers in performance (Slowdown's occur in the batch_normalize function as well as the moments calculation.)
body: Hmm I actually just ran into this locally on my own cnn models. (Didn't think about that benchmark though.) I did a quick profile with cuda and found `reduce_sum`'s being the big killers in performance (Slowdown's occur in the `batch_normalize` function as well as the `moments` calculation.)
